page.title: 06FASHIONS
page.content: Fashions vary according to choice, location and time of year.For instance if one is living in the city one is tempted to have a fancy hairstyle, figetty accessaries and trendy clothing, while for people living in the country, easy-to-keep hair styles, and only necessary accessaries are more practical. Clothes worn according to time of year, appear everywhere. In the summer light coloured clothes are popular while in the Autumn more colourful clothing is popular. Winter brings us the stylish blacks, blues, reds and grey. Clothing popular in this area. ------------------------------ TROUSERS- Baggies or drainpipe, jeans. Material, corderoy. Shorts and Knickerbockers!
